title: Bruised Woman in Photo Is Not Who Filmed Delhi Hyatt incident
subtitle: A photo falsely claims that the woman who recorded the Delhi Hyatt hotel incident last month was beaten up.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A photo of an injured woman is circulating online with a caption, saying she was the one who recorded the Hyatt hotel incident in Delhi last month. ‘Girl who filmed Hyatt video, now in hospital,’ the caption reads.

The video of the Hyatt incident showed former BSP MP Rakesh Pandey's son Ashish pointing a gun at a couple during an argument outside the hotel.

An acquaintance of the accused had filmed the incident from Ashish’s car.
